alert.note: Alert for Austin; Colorado; Fort Bend; Waller; Wharton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 24 at 11:51AM CST until January 24 at 12:15PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Colorado County in southeastern Texas... Northern Wharton County in southeastern Texas... Southeastern Austin County in southeastern Texas... Northwestern Fort Bend County in southeastern Texas... Southeastern Waller County in southeastern Texas... * Until 1215 PM CST. * At 1150 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wallis, or 7 miles south of Sealy, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Katy, Sealy, Brookshire, Wallis, Fulshear, Simonton, San Felipe, Pattison, Weston Lakes and Cinco Ranch. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for southeastern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for southeastern Texas.

area.areaDesc: Austin; Colorado; Fort Bend; Waller; Wharton
